body_html: I'm likely not the only one who would really appreciate a precompiled binary that works with R2Plus1D (i.e. having USE_FFMPEG, USE_OPENCV and (optimally) GPU support enabled). Caffe still has several useful pretrained models for feature extraction.
body_text: I'm likely not the only one who would really appreciate a precompiled binary that works with R2Plus1D (i.e. having USE_FFMPEG, USE_OPENCV and (optimally) GPU support enabled). Caffe still has several useful pretrained models for feature extraction.
body: I'm likely not the only one who would really appreciate a precompiled binary that works with [R2Plus1D](https://github.com/facebookresearch/R2Plus1D) (i.e. having USE_FFMPEG, USE_OPENCV and (optimally) GPU support enabled). Caffe still has several useful pretrained models for feature extraction.
